metadata.Title: CVE-2008-5518

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11

metadata.Description: Multiple directory traversal vulnerabilities in the web administration console in Apache Geronimo Application Server 2.1 through 2.1.3 on Windows allow remote attackers to upload files to arbitrary directories via directory traversal sequences in the (1) group, (2) artifact, (3) version, or (4) fileType parameter to console/portal//Services/Repository (aka the Services/Repository portlet); the (5) createDB parameter to console/portal/Embedded DB/DB Manager (aka the Embedded DB/DB Manager portlet); or the (6) filename parameter to the createKeystore script in the Security/Keystores portlet.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 11 is installed
